name: Vampire Dunk Tank
description:
Made in under 72 hours for Mini-Jam 94
Limitation:  Blood must be lethal
Theme: Vampires

Controls
A and D for moving left and right
Space to attack as a soldier or to control a soldier as the mage
W to activate portals and release control

Story
You have trapped the last vampire, now you must kill him. The only way to slay a vampire is drowning it in holy blood. Take it from his thralls trying to free him to fill the tank. If the thralls destroy your alter you will fail the ritual.

Credits
Art created by Matt Walkden
https://mattwalkden.itch.io/fantasy-battle-pack
